  bit stream(s)    : test18.mpg
  decoded files    : test18_l.pcm
                     test18_r.pcm
                     test18_c.pcm
                     test18_s.pcm
                     

  MPEG1 COMPATIBLE PART 

  bitrate            :        384 kbit/s 
  layer              :	       II 
  sampling frequency :	    48.00 kHz 
  number of subbands :	       27 
  mode               : 	   stereo 
  CRC protection     :         on 
  

  MULTICHANNEL EXTENSION 

  center channel                 :present 
  phantom coding                 :    off 
  surround channels              :   Mono
  LFE channel                    :   none
  presentation matrix            :      0
  number of multilingual channel :      0 
  additional bitstream           :   none  
  dynamic_crosstalk              :     on
  prediction                     :    off
